file_insights.description: Added comprehensive thread-safety tests for ConversationStore
test_scenarios: Concurrent add and get for same conversation

patterns_discovered: Testing concurrent operations with multiple goroutines
Using multiple test cases to simulate different race conditions
Checking store integrity after concurrent operations
gotchas_discovered: Some conversations may overwrite others with same name
Final count of conversations can be indeterminate during concurrent operations
Need to access retrieved conversation data carefully to prevent race conditions

key_validation_points: Store remained functional after concurrent operations

recommendations: Consider implementing a more robust locking mechanism
Add more granular error handling for concurrent operations
Potentially use sync.Map or a mutex-protected map for conversation storage
Implement stricter uniqueness constraints for conversation IDs
